game.title: Quest for Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where magic has disappeared, players take on the role of an ancient artifact hunter tasked with uncovering the secrets behind the world's downfall. As they journey across vast deserts and treacherous mountains, they must navigate treacherous alliances, rival expeditions, and ancient traps left by long-lost civilizations.
game.beginning: The game begins in a bustling marketplace where players acquire their first lead on the artifact, a mysterious scroll rumored to hold the key to restoring magic. From there, they set out into the unforgiving desert, encountering nomadic tribes, hidden ruins, and deadly sandstorms that threaten their quest at every turn.
game.ending: The journey culminates in an ancient city where players uncover the secrets of the world's downfall: a powerful artifact created to manage magic had instead consumed it, leading to its disappearance. Players must make a final choice regarding the future of the world - use the artifact to restore magic but risk losing control or leave it behind and live with a world forever changed.
